verses.verse: Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go <S%H935><s%> in to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and tell <S%H1696><s%> him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.
For if <S%H518><s%> you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go, <S%H7971><s%> and will hold <S%H2388><s%> them still, <S%H5750><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on your cattle <S%H4735><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the field, <S%H7704><s%> on the horses, <S%H5483><s%> on the asses, <S%H2543><s%> on the camels, <S%H1581><s%> on the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and on the sheep: <S%H6629><s%> there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> murrain. <S%H1698><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall sever <S%H6395><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and there shall nothing <S%H3808><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that is the children's <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a set <S%H4150><s%> time, saying, <S%H559><s%> To morrow <S%H4279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that thing <S%H1697><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> died: <S%H4191><s%> but of the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> not one. <S%H259><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was not one <S%H259><s%> of the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> dead. <S%H4191><s%> And the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H3515><s%> and he did not let the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> to you handfuls <S%H4393><s%> <S%H2651><s%> of ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and let Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it toward the heaven <S%H8064><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And it shall become <S%H1961><s%> small dust <S%H80><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and shall be a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking <S%H6524><s%> forth with blains <S%H76><s%> on man, <S%H120><s%> and on beast, <S%H929><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it up toward heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking <S%H6524><s%> forth with blains <S%H76><s%> on man, <S%H120><s%> and on beast. <S%H929><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the boils; <S%H7822><s%> for the boil <S%H7822><s%> was on the magicians, <S%H2748><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he listened <S%H8085><s%> not to them; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Rise <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.

For I will at this <S%H2063><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my plagues <S%H4046><s%> on your heart, <S%H3820><s%> and on your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and on your people; <S%H5971><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> me in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For now <S%H6258><s%> I will stretch <S%H7971><s%> out my hand, <S%H3027><s%> that I may smite <S%H5221><s%> you and your people <S%H5971><s%> with pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> and you shall be cut <S%H3582><s%> off from the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And in very <S%H199><s%> deed <S%H199><s%> for this <S%H2063><s%> cause <S%H5668><s%> have I raised <S%H5975><s%> you up, for to show <S%H7200><s%> in you my power; <S%H3581><s%> and that my name <S%H8034><s%> may be declared <S%H5608><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
As yet <S%H5750><s%> exalt <S%H5549><s%> you yourself against my people, <S%H5971><s%> that you will not let them go? <S%H7971><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> to morrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as has not been <S%H1961><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the foundation <S%H3245><s%> thereof even until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H6258><s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> and gather <S%H5756><s%> your cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have in the field; <S%H7704><s%> for on every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be found <S%H4672><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and shall not be brought <S%H622><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on them, and they shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

He that feared <S%H3373><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> among the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> made his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the houses: <S%H1004><s%>
And he that regarded <S%H3820><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Stretch <S%H5186><s%> forth your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be hail <S%H1259><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on man, <S%H120><s%> and on beast, <S%H929><s%> and on every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> throughout the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> forth his rod <S%H4294><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail, <S%H1259><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> ran <S%H1980><s%> along on the ground; <S%H776><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

So there was hail, <S%H1259><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> mingled <S%H3947><s%> with the hail, <S%H1259><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> grievous, <S%H3515><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as there was none <S%H3808><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> it in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H227><s%> it became <S%H1961><s%> a nation. <S%H1471><s%>

And the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that was in the field, <S%H7704><s%> both man <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were, was there no <S%H3808><s%> hail. <S%H1259><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> this time: <S%H6471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and I and my people <S%H5971><s%> are wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

Entreat <S%H6279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> (for it is enough) <S%H7227><s%> that there be no <S%H3808><s%> more mighty <S%H430><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail; <S%H1259><s%> and I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> and you shall stay <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer. <S%H3254><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, As soon as I am gone <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> I will spread <S%H6566><s%> abroad <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the thunder <S%H6963><s%> shall cease, <S%H2308><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be any <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> hail; <S%H1259><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> how that the earth <S%H776><s%> is the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>
But as for you and your servants, <S%H5650><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you will not yet <S%H2962><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
And the flax <S%H6594><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%> was smitten: <S%H5221><s%> for the barley <S%H8184><s%> was in the ear, <S%H24><s%> and the flax <S%H6594><s%> was in bloom. <S%H1392><s%>
But the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the rye <S%H3698><s%> were not smitten: <S%H5221><s%> for they were not grown <S%H648><s%> up.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> abroad <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%> ceased, <S%H2308><s%> and the rain <S%H4306><s%> was not poured <S%H5413><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the rain <S%H4306><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> were ceased, <S%H2308><s%> he sinned <S%H2398><s%> yet more, <S%H3254><s%> and hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> he and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> would he let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go; <S%H7971><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> by Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
